#summary Initialize a fresh inventory for the specified user.
#labels Protocol-Inventory

= Request Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* || *Required* ||
||ID||UUID of user this inventory will belong to||UUID||Yes||

{{{
POST /services/ HTTP/1.1
Content-Length: 78
Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded

RequestMethod=AddInventorySkeleton
&ID=e4709e21-9a3f-4276-b3cc-22224bdf0199
}}}

= Response Format =

|| *Parameter* || *Description* || *Type* ||
||FolderID||UUID of the root folder||UUID||

{{{
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Date: Thu, 10 Dec 2009 23:20:55 GMT
Server: Apache/2.2.10 (Linux/SUSE)
X-Powered-By: Simian Grid Services
Content-Length: 51
Content-Type: application/json

{ "FolderID":"cf836ad7-d7c2-45bd-97cc-48a6225d8263" }
}}}

= Supported Response Codes =

  * 200
    * The new library was created
  * 409
    * A library already exists for the user
  * 500
    * Internal server error occurred

= Code Examples =
